scripts.db:reset: npx sequelize-cli db:drop && npx sequelize-cli db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.db:delete: npx sequelize-cli db:drop && npx sequelize-cli db:create
scripts.reset: npx sequelize-cli db:drop && npx sequelize-cli db:create && node ./models/index.js && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all && node server.js
